General.Name: Satria Mega Kencana Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Satria Mega Kencana Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates hotels under the Sotis brand in Indonesia. It also owns and leases real estate properties; and offers food and beverages. In addition, the company provides construction and tourism services. Further, it provides spa services. PT Satria Mega Kencana Tbk was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
